groups.name: com.www.common.request
groups.description: 请求响应报文AOP拦截自动配置类.

properties.name: com.www.common.request.enable
properties.description: 是否开启请求响应报文AOP拦截

properties.name: com.www.common.request.content
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长替换的字符串

properties.name: com.www.common.request.replace
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长时是否开启字符串替换

properties.name: com.www.common.request.length
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长时字符串长度限制
